TEXT.TITLE: OWENS-CORNING FIBERGLAS <OCF> SELLS FOAM UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Owens-Corning Fiberglas Corp said it sold its controlling interest in its French foam insulation producing subsidiary to a Lafarege Corp <LAF> subsidiary. Owens-Corning said it sold its interest in Sentuc Porxpan SA for an undisclosed price. Reuter
